name: generate_podcast
description: Generate a NotebookLM Audio Overview (Podcast) from a local directory.

sourceDir.description: Local directory containing source files (e.g., e:\Antigravity\Serbian)

destDir.description: Optional destination for the generated MP3 file (defaults to sourceDir)

podcastName.description: Name for the notebook and podcast (e.g., 'Serbian Immersion')

force.description: Force regeneration if file already exists
